attributes.action: Seriously look at the SIA Security Licence Law Department
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see the SIA abolished or changed as it is only another way of making money and also too it is stopping me from getting jobs why???
All I keep getting told is you have to wait for your SIA licence before.
I paid £199 for my course and passed now I have paid The licence application fee is £190 for a 3 year licence and is not refundable and Im unemployed is this fair. All I am trying to do is get back to work. I had the oppertunity today to do just that I sent for my Licence over 2 weeks ago and now I get told it could take up to another 4,5, weeks. I dont think this is right.
